Interface for abstracting HTTP REST requests

jonathanl (shibo)

    • readRequest

      <T extends MicroservletRequest> T readRequest(Class<T> requestType)
      Reads a MicroservletRequest object from the JSON in the servlet request input stream.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The object type
      Parameters:
      requestType - The type of object to deserialize from JSON
      Returns:
      The deserialized object, or null if deserialization failed
